caption.center: IN RE: PERMANENT REASSIGNMENT OF JUDGE OF THE COURT OF COMMON PLEAS OF
PHILADELPHIA COUNTY. FIRST JUDICIAL DISTRICT OF PENNSYLVANIA, TO A

opinion.posture: No. 225 Common Pleas Judicial Classification Docket No. 2.
opinion.opinion_text: AND NOW, this 9th day of January, 2001, the Petition of Alex Bonavitacola, President Judge of the Court of Common Pleas of Philadelphia County, First Judicial District of Pennsylvania, for the permanent reassignment of The Honorable Sheldon C. Jelin to the Family Court Division of said Court is hereby granted.
